rex_touchwrap.name: Touch wrap
rex_touchwrap.description: A wrap from official Touch plugin to export touch/mouse input to other plugins.

use-mouse-input.name: Use mouse input
use-mouse-input.desc: Use mouse clicks as single-touch input (useful for testing).

on-touch-start.description: Triggered when any touch input begins.

on-touch-end.description: Triggered when any touch input ends.

is-in-touch.description: True if any touch is currently in contact with the device.

on-touch-object.description: Triggered when an object is touched.

object0.name: Object
object0.desc: Choose the object to check for touch.

is-touching-object.description: Test if in a touch and the touch point is over an object.

object0.name: Object
object0.desc: Choose the object to check for being touched.

orientation-supported.description: True if the device supports orientation detection.

motion-supported.description: True if the device supports motion detection.

compare-touch-speed.description: Compare the speed of a touch, e.g. to detect a swipe.

touch_index0.name: Touch index
touch_index0.desc: The zero-based index of the touch to test the speed for.  0 is the first touch.

comparison1.name: Comparison
comparison1.desc: How to compare the touch speed.

speed2.name: Speed
speed2.desc: Speed to compare to, in absolute pixels per second.

compare-acceleration.description: Compare the acceleration of the device along an axis.

orientation3.name: Orientation
orientation3.desc: Choose the orientation to compare (alpha = compass direction, beta = front-to-back tilt, gamma = left-to-right tilt).

axis12.name: Axis
axis12.desc: Choose the axis to compare acceleration for, and whether the measurement should include the force of gravity.

acceleration14.name: Acceleration
acceleration14.desc: The acceleration to compare to, in m/s^2.

on-nth-touch-start.description: Triggered when a particular touch input begins.

touch_number0.name: Touch number
touch_number0.desc: Enter a zero-based index of the touch to test, e.g. 0 for first touch, 1 for second, etc.

on-nth-touch-end.description: Triggered when a particular touch input ends.

touch_number0.name: Touch number
touch_number0.desc: Enter a zero-based index of the touch to test, e.g. 0 for first touch, 1 for second, etc.

has-nth-touch.description: True if a particular touch is currently in contact with the device.

touch_number0.name: Touch number
touch_number0.desc: Enter a zero-based index of the touch to test, e.g. 0 for first touch, 1 for second, etc.

on-hold-gesture.description: Triggered when a touch held in the same place for a time.

on-tap-gesture.description: Triggered when a touch is quickly released from its start location.

on-double-tap-gesture.description: Triggered when two taps occur in quick succession.

on-hold-gesture-object.description: Triggered when a hold gesture is made over an object.

on-tap-gesture-object.description: Triggered when a tap gesture is made on an object.

on-double-tap-gesture-object.description: Triggered when a double-tap gesture is made on an object.

on-touch-released-object.description: Triggered when an object is touch released.

object0.name: Object
object0.desc: Choose the object to check for touch released.

x.description: Get the primary touch X co-ordinate in the layout.

y.description: Get the primary touch Y co-ordinate in the layout.

absolute-x.description: Get the primary touch X co-ordinate on the canvas.

absolute-y.description: Get the primary touch Y co-ordinate on the canvas.

alpha.description: The device compass direction, in degrees.

beta.description: The device front-to-back tilt, in degrees (front is positive).

gamma.description: The device left-to-right tilt, in degrees (right is positive).

acceleration-x-with-g.description: The device X acceleration with gravity, in m/s^2.

acceleration-y-with-g.description: The device Y acceleration with gravity, in m/s^2.

acceleration-z-with-g.description: The device Z acceleration with gravity, in m/s^2.

acceleration-x.description: The device X acceleration without gravity (if supported), in m/s^2.

acceleration-y.description: The device Y acceleration without gravity (if supported), in m/s^2.

acceleration-z.description: The device Z acceleration without gravity (if supported), in m/s^2.

touch-count.description: Get the number of current touches.

x-at.description: Get a touch X co-ordinate in the layout from a zero-based index of the touch.

index0.name: Index
index0.desc: Zero-based index of the touch to get.

y-at.description: Get a touch Y co-ordinate in the layout from a zero-based index of the touch.

index0.name: Index
index0.desc: Zero-based index of the touch to get.

absolute-x-at.description: Get a touch X co-ordinate on the canvas from a zero-based index of the touch.

index0.name: Index
index0.desc: Zero-based index of the touch to get.

absolute-y-at.description: Get a touch Y co-ordinate on the canvas from a zero-based index of the touch.

index0.name: Index
index0.desc: Zero-based index of the touch to get.

speed-at.description: Get the speed of a touch, in absolute (screen) pixels per second.

index0.name: Index
index0.desc: Zero-based index of the touch to get.

angle-at.description: Get the angle of motion of a touch, in degrees.

index0.name: Index
index0.desc: Zero-based index of the touch to get.

touch-index.description: Get the index of the current touch.

touch-id.description: Get the unique ID of the current touch.

x-for-id.description: Get a touch X co-ordinate in the layout for a touch with a specific ID.

id0.name: ID
id0.desc: ID of the touch to get.

y-for-id.description: Get a touch Y co-ordinate in the layout for a touch with a specific ID.

id0.name: ID
id0.desc: ID of the touch to get.

absolute-x-for-id.description: Get a touch X co-ordinate on the canvas for a touch with a specific ID.

id0.name: ID
id0.desc: ID of the touch to get.

absolute-y-for-id.description: Get a touch Y co-ordinate on the canvas for a touch with a specific ID.

id0.name: ID
id0.desc: ID of the touch to get.

speed-for-id.description: Get the speed of a touch with a specific ID, in absolute (screen) pixels per second.

id0.name: ID
id0.desc: ID of the touch to get.

angle-for-id.description: Get the angle of motion of a touch with a specific ID, in degrees.

id0.name: ID
id0.desc: ID of the touch to get.

width-for-id.description: Get the width of a touch with a specific ID.

id0.name: ID
id0.desc: ID of the touch to get.

height-for-id.description: Get the height of a touch with a specific ID.

id0.name: ID
id0.desc: ID of the touch to get.

pressure-for-id.description: Get the pressure (from 0 to 1) of a touch with a specific ID.

id0.name: ID
id0.desc: ID of the touch to get.
